        Gets the local root context node of this graph.
        Specified by:
        getRootContextNode in interface Graph
        Parameters:
        subgraph - This is simply a hint to the implementation whether child context nodes will subsequently be requested. Implementations may or may not actually use this parameter.
        Returns:
        The graph's local root context node.

      • getKeyValueStore

        public KeyValueStore getKeyValueStore()
        Returns the key/value store this graph is based on. WARNING: Do not alter the contents of the store using this method, or your XDI graph may get corrupted.
        Returns:
        The key/value store backing this graph.

      • getSupportGetContextNodes

        public boolean getSupportGetContextNodes()
        Returns:
        True, if this key/value graph supports enumerating contexts.

      • getSupportGetRelations

        public boolean getSupportGetRelations()
        Returns:
        True, if this key/value graph supports enumerating relations.
